title: Blow out
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Tom Williamson and David Sims
brief_description: A light-hearted look at the New Zealanders’ obsession with four wheeled transport, including colourful footage of cars. Provokes ideas about the place of cars in society, as a status symbol and reflection of the owner’s personality.
creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, Tom Williamson and David Sims
